channel.title: [new deets!]Fally Attack![Re-realse]
channel.description:
Hello, This is a quick source I used Please do not rep++ or rep-- seeing I've hd this posted before, I'm not here for the rep rlly..>.> Credits:
Creator of cammy pvp source Me
Source download: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=UYAY1YDN
Client download: http://uppit.com/v/XL5KU4XL
heres a few rough details
Home is Fallador bank (one by mining guild)
::home takes you there also, right outside of the bank is pvp.
All shops are in there and so is the crate,
partyhats give str bonuses so do boots of lightness, they are both unspawnable you may get them buy spawning in the char files, ect. Full PvP
d claws model added, just gotta add the item.
::staffzone is there like before, you can also edit the home area anytime and ::home command ect in client.java
Dds is sorta over-powered, never got to fixing that.
Trading is not valid as usual, only staff may trade normal players, ect.
Also I may add a few more things to the source soon, like gs models..D:
If you need any help editing message here I will try to help..:)
Please do not post "leech" seeing it's not I gave all creds who made which was me and the creator of cammy pvp source
source link: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=UYAY1YDN
client: http://uppit.com/v/XL5KU4XL
pics: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2hfl2xk.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/x2nyq8.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/abh5b5.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2lvczs6.jpg[/img]
You may check out the rest for yourself!
